issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Kitchensink > views > View Gestures.
Pinch and zoom is enabled even on clicking 'Remove pinch' button given on the window.

Test steps
1:Pinch and zoom on the image(titanium ribbon)
2:Press on remove pinch

Expected result
1:Should be able to pinch and zoom the image
2:Should not be able to pinch and zoom the images

Actual: Able to pinch and zoom images even after pressing 'remove pinch' button.
fields.summary: iOS: Kitchensink - Pinch and zoom is enabled even on clicking 'Remove pinch' button given on the window.
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK version: 2.0.0.v20120326211803
Platform & version: iOS (v 4.3.5)
Host Operating System: OSX 10.7.2
Titanium Studio version: 2.0.0.201203262445

comments.body: This issue is also seen on Iphone4S(iOS 6 ) running kitchensink.

Also observed the issue on:
Tested Environment:

Appcelerator Studio:  3.2.0.201311261642
SDK:3.2.0.v20131127194046
alloy: 1.3.0
acs: 1.0.9
npm: 1.3.2
titanium: 3.2.0-beta	
titanium-code-processor: 1.1.0-beta
Xcode:5.0.2
OS: Mac OSX 10.9
Device: iphone5(V7.0.4)

Issue is reproducible using the following environment.
Tested on:
Device : iPhone 5s , iOS version : 7.1
SDK: 3.2.2.v20140214120903
CLI version : 3.2.1
OS : MAC OSX 10.9
Alloy:  1.3.1
ACS: 1.0.12
npm:1.3.2
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.2.1.201401311225
titanium-code-processor: 1.1.0
XCode : 5.1 Beta 5

The issue still exists. Tested on:
Titanium SDK: 3.5.1.GA
Xcode: 6.2
iPhone 5S (v8.2)
CLI: 3.4.2
Node: 0.10.36
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
